title: Google Pixel 3 Android 9 Mobile network > Advanced > Add Carrier for eSIM missing/not available
content:
I attempted to find a solution by referring to this thread. I posted there hoping the original poster LLAB will share more details but it has been some time. Hence I'm posting a new post.

I recently purchased a Google Pixel 3 and it was pre-installed with Android 9. It has been updated to the latest Android 9 updated security patch level: 5 April 2019. 

The following related apps; 
Carrier Services version: 22.0.243910317-carrierservices_V22F_RC12
eSIM Manager version: D.1.5.24-google (5445861)

The issue I am having is the "Carrier" option/feature is MISSING / NOT AVAILABLE (step 5 below) when I am attempting to scan QR code or manual enter the activation code for Google Pixel 3 :
Go to “Settings”
Go to “Network & internet”
Go to “Mobile network”
Select “Advanced”
Select “Carrier”
Select “Add carrier”
Scan the QR code or manual enter the activation code, the eSIM profile will be downloaded


I hope someone can help
